description.en_US: This a sink plugin for file, it can be used for saving the analysis data into file system.
description.zh_CN: 本插件为文件持久化插件，可以用于将分析数据存入指定的文件中。

hint.en_US: The name of the folder where the pictures are saved, such as ./tmp. Note: For multiple rules, their paths cannot be repeated, otherwise they will be deleted from each other.
hint.zh_CN: 保存图片的文件夹名，例如 ./tmp。注意：多条 rule 路径不能重复，否则会出现彼此删除的现象。

hint.en_US: File format, support jpeg and png.
hint.zh_CN: 文件格式，支持 jpeg 和 png。

hint.en_US: Maximum file storage time (hours). The default value is 72, which means that the picture can be stored for up to 3 days.
hint.zh_CN: 最长文件存储时间(小时)。默认值为72，这表示图片最多保存3天。

hint.en_US: The maximum number of stored pictures. The default value is 1000. The earlier pictures will be deleted. The relationship with maxAge is OR.
hint.zh_CN: 存储图片的最大数量，默认值是1000，删除时间较早的图片，与maxAge是或的关系。
